amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Community Oriented Policing Services program by $5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to revise amounts in the bill by increasing the amount made available under title I for "Community Oriented Policing Services" and reducing the amount made available under title IV for "International Organizations--Contributions to International Organizations", by $5 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Renzi amendment (A070) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A070) offered by Mr. Renzi.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Renzi amendment (A070) Agreed to by voice vote.
